summary: Comprehensive testing of Registry CRUD, Shareholder Dashboard Registry View, Floating Chat, and Footer features completed. All backend APIs (14/14 tests passed) and frontend features working correctly. Admin can create/edit/delete registry entries, shareholders have read-only view, floating chat enables user-admin communication, and footer displays proper copyright and links.

ui_bugs.issue: Emergent badge overlay intercepts clicks on floating chat button - requires force=True or JS click workaround
ui_bugs.workaround: Use JavaScript click or force=True to bypass overlay

passed_tests: Backend: Admin login (admin@test.com / admin1234)
Backend: Seller login (seller@test.com / test1234)
Backend: Buyer login (buyer@test.com / test1234)
Backend: GET /api/registry - Admin can view all entries
Backend: POST /api/registry - Admin can create new entries
Backend: PUT /api/registry/{id} - Admin can update entries
Backend: DELETE /api/registry/{id} - Admin can delete entries
Backend: Seller/shareholder cannot create registry entries (403)
Backend: Shareholder can view registry (limited to own entries)
Backend: POST /api/admin-chat - User can send message to admin
Backend: GET /api/admin-chat - User can view their chat messages
Backend: Admin can view all chat messages
Backend: Admin can send replies in chat
Frontend: Admin panel - Registry tab ('Реестр пайщиков') displays correctly
Frontend: Admin can add new registry entry via dialog form
Frontend: Admin can edit existing registry entries
Frontend: Admin can delete registry entries
Frontend: Shareholder dashboard - Registry tab shows read-only view
Frontend: Shareholder registry view has no edit/delete buttons
Frontend: Floating chat button visible on all pages
Frontend: Floating chat window opens and shows messages
Frontend: Users can send messages via floating chat
Frontend: Admin can see user messages in chat
Frontend: Footer displays copyright 'Потребительский кооператив КАЙФ ОЗЕРО'
Frontend: Footer contains links to Rules and Offer pages
Frontend: Cookie consent banner displayed correctly
seed_data_creation: Test entries created and cleaned up after testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All registry CRUD, shareholder registry view, floating chat, and footer features are fully functional. Previous iterations tested: auth, products, deals, knowledge base, news, ticker. The app uses Russian UI by default. Floating chat button has minor overlay issue with Emergent badge but works with JS click.
